title: [Solhaven, Tidewater Road]
description: Hanging nets, stacked lobster cages and large wicker maunds are ranged about the intersection, and small wooden stools stand amongst partially-mended nets.  In a circle of lantern light, an older fellow is busy wrapping a rusted chain around a ground rope, a pile of recently removed wooden bobbins at his feet.

In a circle of lantern light, an older fellow is busy wrapping a rusted chain around a ground rope, a pile of recently removed wooden bobbins at his feet.

Hanging nets, stacked lobster cages, and large wicker maunds are ranged about the intersection, and small wooden stools stand amongst partially mended nets.  Nearby, an older fellow is busy wrapping a rusted chain around a ground rope, a pile of recently removed wooden bobbins at his feet.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, south, west
